 28namespace vsip
 29{
 30namespace impl
 31{
 32namespace fft
 33{
 34
 35template <typename InT,
 36	  typename OutT>
 37struct Select_fft_size
 38{
 39  static length_type exec(length_type /*in_size*/, length_type out_size)
 40  { return out_size; }
 41};
 42
 43template <typename T>
 44struct Select_fft_size<T, std::complex<T> >
 45{
 46  static length_type exec(length_type in_size, length_type /*out_size*/)
 47  { return in_size; }
 48};
 49
 50template <typename InT,
 51	  typename OutT>
 52inline length_type
 53select_fft_size(length_type in_size, length_type out_size)
 54{
 55  return Select_fft_size<InT, OutT>::exec(in_size, out_size);
 56}
 57
 58
 59
 60/// This provides the temporary data as well as the
 61/// conversion logic from blocks to arrays as expected
 62/// by fft backends.
 63template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O>
 64class Ct_workspace;
 65
 66template <typename InT,
 67	  typename OutT>
 68class Ct_workspace<1, InT, OutT>
 69{
 70  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
 71
 72public:
 73  template <typename BE>
 74  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<1> const &in, Domain<1> const &out,
 75	       scalar_type scale)
 76    : scale_(scale),
 77      input_buffer_(in.size()),
 78      output_buffer_(out.size())
 79  {
 80  }
 81  
 82  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
 83  void by_reference(BE *backend,
 84		    const_Vector<InT, Block0>& in,
 85		    Vector<OutT, Block1>& out)
 86  {
 87    {
 88      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
 89      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
 90
 91      backend->by_reference(
 92		in_ext.data(),  in_ext.stride(0),
 93		out_ext.data(), out_ext.stride(0),
 94		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)));
 95    }
 96
 97    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
 98    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
 99      out *= scale_;
100  }
101
102  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
103  void in_place(BE *backend, Vector<OutT, BlockT> inout)
104  {
105    {
106      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
107      // necessary.
108      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT); // input_buffer_.get());
109    
110      // Call the backend.
111      backend->in_place(inout_ext.data(),
112			inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.size(0));
113    }
114    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
115    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
116      inout *= scale_;
117  }
118
119private:
120  scalar_type scale_;
121  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
122  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
123};
124
125
126
127template <typename InT,
128	  typename OutT>
129class Ct_workspace<2, InT, OutT>
130{
131  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
132
133public:
134  template <typename BE>
135  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<2> const &in, Domain<2> const &out,
136	       scalar_type scale)
137    : scale_(scale),
138      input_buffer_(in.size()),
139      output_buffer_(out.size())
140  {
141  }
142  
143  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
144  void by_reference(BE *backend,
145		    const_Matrix<InT, Block0> in,
146		    Matrix<OutT, Block1> out)
147  {
148    {
149      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
150      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
151
152      backend->by_reference(
153		in_ext.data(),  in_ext.stride(0),  in_ext.stride(1),
154		out_ext.data(), out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1),
155		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)),
156		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(1), out_ext.size(1)));
157    }
158
159    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
160    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
161      out *= scale_;
162  }
163
164  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
165  void in_place(BE *backend, Matrix<OutT, BlockT> inout)
166  {
167    {
168      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
169      // necessary.
170      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT); // FIXME (split): input_buffer_.get());
171    
172      // Call the backend.
173      backend->in_place(inout_ext.data(),
174			inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1),
175			inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1));
176    }
177    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
178    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
179      inout *= scale_;
180  }
181
182private:
183  scalar_type scale_;
184  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
185  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
186};
187
188
189template <typename InT,
190	  typename OutT>
191class Ct_workspace<3, InT, OutT>
192{
193  typedef typename Scalar_of<OutT>::type scalar_type;
194
195public:
196  template <typename BE>
197  Ct_workspace(BE* /*backend*/, Domain<3> const &in, Domain<3> const &out,
198	       scalar_type scale)
199    : scale_(scale),
200      input_buffer_(in.size()),
201      output_buffer_(out.size())
202  {
203  }
204  
205  template <typename BE, typename Block0, typename Block1>
206  void by_reference(BE *backend,
207		    const_Tensor<InT, Block0> in,
208		    Tensor<OutT, Block1> out)
209  {
210    {
211      Ext_data<Block0> in_ext (in.block(),  SYNC_IN);
212      Ext_data<Block1> out_ext(out.block(), SYNC_OUT);
213
214      backend->by_reference(
215		in_ext.data(), 
216		in_ext.stride(0), in_ext.stride(1), in_ext.stride(2),
217		out_ext.data(),
218		out_ext.stride(0), out_ext.stride(1), out_ext.stride(2),
219		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(0), out_ext.size(0)),
220		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(1), out_ext.size(1)),
221		select_fft_size<InT, OutT>(in_ext.size(2), out_ext.size(2)));
222    }
223
224    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
225    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
226      out *= scale_;
227  }
228
229  template <typename BE, typename BlockT>
230  void in_place(BE *backend, Vector<OutT, BlockT> inout)
231  {
232    {
233      // Create a 'direct data accessor', adjusting the block layout if
234      // necessary.
235      Ext_data<BlockT> inout_ext(inout.block(), SYNC_INOUT,
236				 input_buffer_.get());
237    
238      // Call the backend.
239      backend->in_place(
240		inout_ext.data(),
241		inout_ext.stride(0), inout_ext.stride(1), inout_ext.stride(2),
242		inout_ext.size(0), inout_ext.size(1), inout_ext.size(2));
243    }
244    // Scale the data if not already done by the backend.
245    if (!backend->supports_scale() && !almost_equal(scale_, scalar_type(1.)))
246      inout *= scale_;
247  }
248
249private:
250  scalar_type scale_;
251  aligned_array<InT> input_buffer_;
252  aligned_array<OutT> output_buffer_;
253};
